name: Planet Defender (itch) (Dylan McQuitty)
description:
PLANET DEFENDER is a twin-stick shooter based on Super Stardust HD designed as a bullet hell type game.

Can be played with a keyboard but a controller/gamepad is highly recommended!

Attributions:
  • Icons made by Lorc and sbed. Available on https://game-icons.net
  • Music by Muchkin, https://twitter.com/muchkinmusic
  • Sound effects by Kenney, https://www.kenney.nl
  • Spaceship models by Quaternius, https://twitter.com/quaternius
